name: cc65
description: cc65 is a complete cross-development package for 65(C)02 systems, including a powerful macro assembler, C compiler, linker, librarian, and several other tools.
The compiler was initially developed by Ullrich von Bassewitz. It is the oldest compiler in this comparison and is usually the first choice for C programming on 6502-based systems.
pros: Excellent standard library and cross-platform API
Excellent compliance with the C standard
Good support for mixing C and assembly
cons: Generated code is not very efficient
